a1: World Cup 2018 was the last chance for the Croatian golden generation.
q2: This team will always be remembered by their country.
a2: totally agree, it was a great golden age and the lack of growth, will have more opportunities
q3: Don't you think they have one last chance in two years?
a3: Croatia will continue to have growth in their players so they can compete for the World cup in future years .
q4: Croatia leaders will age and team results will only decrease from now
a4: Modric is the best player in Croatia
q5: What is the color of Croatia's jersey?
a5: When they're playing away = black and navy. When they're playing home = red and white.
